alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 12:25AM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of four to six inches above 6,000 feet. Snowfall of two to four inches from 4,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Winds will gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Sierra Nevada from Yosemite to Tulare County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel delays and/or road closures are possible.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, allow plenty of time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
